title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
Introducing the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406. This exquisite timepiece is a perfect blend of style and functionality, designed to elevate your wrist game to new heights.

Crafted with precision and attention to detail, this watch features a stunning black sunburst dial adorned with gold-tone and silver-tone accents. The dial is complemented by luminescent hands and markers, ensuring easy readability in any lighting condition.

The gold-tone stainless steel case exudes a sense of luxury, while the black unidirectional timing bezel with gold-tone accents adds a touch of sophistication. The domed mineral crystal provides durability and protection, ensuring your watch stays in pristine condition.

With a water resistance of up to 100 meters, this watch is suitable for all your aquatic adventures. Whether you're swimming, snorkeling, or simply caught in the rain, this timepiece will keep ticking without skipping a beat.

Functionality is at the heart of this watch, featuring a 6-hand chronograph and calendar display. Keep track of time with precision and stay organized with the convenient calendar function. The chronograph allows you to measure elapsed time with ease.

The gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with curved and faceted links adds a touch of elegance to your wrist. The sport foldover closure ensures a secure and comfortable fit, making it perfect for all-day wear.

Upgrade your style game with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406. It's time to make a statement.

With water resistance up to 100 meters, this timepiece is suitable for everyday wear and can withstand splashes or brief immersion in water.

The gold-tone stainless steel bracelet, designed with curved and faceted links, adds a touch of sophistication and comfort to your wrist. The sport foldover closure ensures a secure fit, allowing you to wear this watch with confidence.

Upgrade your style with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406. Experience the perfect blend of luxury, functionality, and timeless design.
